{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Runtop |model=WR-4457 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/08/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM,unknown |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KFY-WR4457 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000;88W8000-NNC, CK29000.1, 0333 B0P, Taiwan; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ, A15735.1, 0402 B00, Taiwan; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Internet Sharing Router}}
"PCWR4450-000-MM500" is silkscreened on the board.
The FCC test report lists the following as identical (aside from appearance and antenna configuration)... *[[Blitzz BWA721]] *WR4455 *WR4458 (RP-SMA antenna connector) *WR4457
The default IP and credentials are sourced from the manual in the FCC documents.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''HON-KWANG''' D12-1A (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 23W -> 12VDC, 1000mA).
